price: Nítorí náà, A tẹ atẹ́gùn ba fún un. Ó ń fẹ́ pẹ̀lú àṣẹ rẹ̀ ní ìrọ̀rùn síbi tí ó bá fẹ́.
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
